changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_attribute AS SELECT ba.id, b.name AS product, a.name AS attribute, ba.numeric_value, ba.integer_value, ba.boolean_value, ba.text_value, u.name AS unit, ba.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, ba.update_date FROM ruleform.product_attribute ba JOIN ruleform.product b ON ba.product = b.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON ba.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.unit u ON ba.unit = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON ba.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON ba.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_attribute OWNER TO core;
